result.title: Some thoughts for the first time using codeforces
result.content:
1. my awful English make me crazy.
  2. my awful confidence on math make me fail.
  3. my awful problems solving speed make me die.
  4. maybe read all problems first is a better choice, for I finally solved 908F - New Year and Rainbow Roads 1 minutes after the contest...
  5. This difficulty is acceptable, I will often come here to challenge myself. Emmmmm...both programing and English.
  6. maybe I'd better go to sleep...it is 3:00 am in Beijing.
